channel.title: Tools on LiaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on LiaScript

item.title: Setting up Atom (Deprecated)
item.description: This post will help you to set up your Atom with the appropriate plugins to speed up your development process.

item.title: Install Atom with LiaScript (Deprecated)
item.description: This blog entry presents a little workaround and shows how you can still use our two plugins to develop your LiaScript courses offline with the Atom editor.

item.title: Install Visual Studio Code with LiaScript
item.description: Due to some problems with package updates for Atom editor, we decided to created two LiaScript extensions for VSCode .
